{{cpp/io/basic_filebuf/title | uflow }}
{{cpp/io/basic_filebuf/navbar}}
{{ddcl |
protected:
virtual int_type uflow()
}}

Behaves like the {{lc|underflow()}}, except that if {{lc|underflow()}} succeeds (does not return {{c|Traits::eof()}}), then advances the next pointer for the get area. In other words, consumes one of the characters obtained by {{lc|underflow()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The value of the character that was read and consumed in case of success, or {{c|Traits::eof()}} in case of failure.
